sqlMap.sql: insert into LNSBASICINFOCAL (OPENBRC, ACCTNO, ACCTYPE, CCY, CUSTTYPE, CUSTOMID, NAME, PRDCODE, FLAG1, PRINMINDAYS, INTMINDAYS, ISCALINT, REPAYWAY, LOANTYPE1, LOANSTAT, PROFITBRC, ACCTNO1, FIRSTPRINDATE, FIRSTINTDATE, FIRSTINTFLAG, PRINPERFORMULA, PRINFORMULA, LASTPRINDATE, INTPERFORMULA, INTFORMULA, LASTINTDATE, PRINTERMS, INTTERMS, CURPRINTERM, CURINTTERM, OLDPRINTERM, OLDINTTERM, CONTRACTBAL, OPENDATE, BEGININTDATE, GRACEDAYS, CONTDUEDATE, INTENDDATE, EXTNUMS, INTRATEPLAN, BJTXBL, TXACCTNO, DIACCT, INVESTEE, INVESTMODE, CHANNELTYPE, FUNDCHANNEL, OUTSERIALNO, CONTRASCTNO, CONTRACTAMT, OPENFEE, DEDUCTIONAMT, PROVISIONFLAG, MEMO, NORMALRATE, OVERDUERATE, OVERDUERATE1, MODIFYDATE, MODIFYTIME, TRANDATE, RESERV1, RESERVAMT1) values (:openbrc, :acctno, :acctype, :ccy, :custtype, :customid, :name, :prdcode, :flag1, :prinmindays, :intmindays, :iscalint, :repayway, :loantype1, :loanstat, :profitbrc, :acctno1, :firstprindate, :firstintdate, :firstintflag, :prinperformula, :prinformula, :lastprindate, :intperformula, :intformula, :lastintdate, :printerms, :intterms, :curprinterm, :curintterm, :oldprinterm, :oldintterm, :contractbal, :opendate, :beginintdate, :gracedays, :contduedate, :intenddate, :extnums, :intrateplan, :bjtxbl, :txacctno, :diacct, :investee, :investmode, :channeltype, :fundchannel, :outserialno, :contrasctno, :contractamt, :openfee, :deductionamt, :provisionflag, :memo, :normalrate, :overduerate, :overduerate1, :modifydate, current timestamp, :trandate, :reserv1, :reservamt1)
